Bash(cat "/Users/stevenagh76/.claude/projects/-Users-stevenagh76-Documents-Aspire-app-2/8d2d73ea-a20b-4cc2-a421-5cc4cc27c229/tool-results/mcp-supabase-search_docs-1772125711004.txt" | python3 -c "
import json, sys
data = json.load\(sys.stdin\)
for item in data:
    text = item.get\('text', ''\)
    # Parse the nested JSON
    parsed = json.loads\(text\) if text.startswith\('{'\) else {}
    nodes = parsed.get\('data', {}\).get\('searchDocs', {}\).get\('nodes', []\)
    for node in nodes:
        title = node.get\('title', 'N/A'\)
        href = node.get\('href', 'N/A'\)
        subs = node.get\('subsections', {}\).get\('nodes', []\)
        print\(f'== {title} =='\)
        print\(f'   {href}'\)
        for sub in subs[:5]:
            print\(f'   - {sub.get\(\\"title\\", \\"\\"\)}'\)
            content = sub.get\('content', ''\)
            if content and len\(content\) > 500:
                content = content[:500] + '...'
            if content:
                print\(f'     {content[:200]}'\)
        print\(\)
" 2>&1 | head -100)

Bash(cat "/Users/stevenagh76/.claude/projects/-Users-stevenagh76-Documents-Aspire-app-2/8d2d73ea-a20b-4cc2-a421-5cc4cc27c229/tool-results/mcp-supabase-search_docs-1772125711004.txt" | python3 -c "
import json, sys
raw = sys.stdin.read\(\)
data = json.loads\(raw\)
for item in data:
    text = item.get\('text', ''\)
    # Find JSON objects in the text
    if 'searchDocs' in text:
        # Extract subsection content about middleware, createServerClient etc.
        import re
        # Find createServerClient mentions
        matches = re.findall\(r'createServerClient.*?\\n', text[:5000]\)
        for m in matches[:5]:
            print\(m.strip\(\)[:200]\)
        # Find middleware mentions  
        matches = re.findall\(r'middleware.*?\\n', text[:5000]\)
        for m in matches[:5]:
            print\(m.strip\(\)[:200]\)
" 2>&1)
